Din rolle vil være afgørende i at fremme kontinuerlig forbedring og understøtte Garmins vækst.  Built to last  Tre enkle ord, der beskriver vores produkter, vores virksomhed, vores kultur og vores fremtid. Vi laver produkter til den aktive livsstil. Det gør vi for, at vores kunder kan få mest muligt ud af den tid, de bruger på at forfølge deres passion.  Med mere end 18.000 medarbejdere fordelt på 82 kontorer rundt om i verden, bringer vi GPS-navigation og teknologi til bil-, luftfarts-, marine-, udendørs- og fitnessmarkederne. Vi mener, at hver dag er en mulighed for at innovere og en chance for at ”Beat yesterday”.  Om jobbet  Hos os står ordet forbedring ikke blot på papiret – det er kernen i alt, hvad vi gør. Vores dedikation går på tværs af afdelinger og landegrænser med ét mål: kontinuerlig proces- og profitoptimering gennem procesinnovation.  Med reference til Garmins Nordic Supply Chain Manager kommer du til at spille en afgørende rolle i Garmin Nordics udvikling i tæt samarbejde med de 3 øvrige kollegaer i teamet.   Dine primære ansvarsområder:    Opbygning af solid web scraping-arkitektur: Du vil udvikle og opretholde et stærkt fundament for dataindsamling fra hjemmesider, sikre effektive databaser og scripts og sørge for, at denne infrastruktur er pålidelig og opdateret  Fremme proceseffektivitet: Gennem aktivt at identificere og implementere optimeringer vil du skabe merværdi på tværs af organisationens mange facetter og sikre en konstant forbedring af vores interne processer  Innovativ procesudvikling med moderne værktøjer: Du vil bringe nye optimeringsløsninger til live ved at anvende værktøjer som Microsoft Power Platforms  Vedligeholdelse af procesautomatiseringsmiljøer: Du vil sørge for, at vores nuværende miljø i Microsoft Power Platform forbliver effektivt, pålideligt og opdateret med de nyeste funktioner og opdateringer    Faglige kvalifikationer    Uddannelse indenfor datalogi eller andet relevant område er en fordel  Flydende i engelsk både mundtligt og skriftligt  Teknisk baggrund og kendskab til et eller flere programmeringssprog såsom JS, Python eller C#  Fuldt fortrolig med Microsoft Excel. Kundskab i Power Query og hands on-erfaring med Power Query M er en fordel  Fortrolighed med databaser, command prompt og power shell er en fordel  Fortrolighed med Microsoft Power Platform og PowerFX er en fordel  Grundlæggende kendskab til AI og machine learning    Personlige kvalifikationer   Som person er du drevet af en indre nysgerrighed og en løsningsorienteret holdning, der holder dig selvmotiveret og fokuseret på at opnå resultater. Vi værdsætter en åben dialog, hvor spørgsmål og ideudveksling bliver opfordret, og hvor du, med din videbegærlighed og dit engagement, bidrager til et inspirerende arbejdsmiljø.  I din tilgang til det analytiske arbejde udmærker du dig ved en metodisk og detaljeorienteret indsats, hvilket afspejles i din strukturerede håndtering af opgaver. Du finder det også naturligt at engagere dig proaktivt med kolleger på tværs af funktioner, hvilket sikrer, at både effektivitet og kvalitet er i højsædet i alle projekter og arbejdsprocesser.  Dit selvstændige arbejde er karakteriseret ved en robust formidlingsevne, hvor du effektivt oversætter komplekse tekniske koncepter til klare, forståelige budskaber for ikke-tekniske interessenter. Din kritiske tankegang og analytiske tilgang gør dig i stand til at navigere gennem udfordringer, idet du altid søger efter innovative løsninger for at nå dine mål. Du står fast, selv når du støder på forhindringer, og din evne til at tænke ud af boksen leder dig til succesfulde resultater.  Du tilbydes  Hos Garmin bliver du en del af en familiær kultur med en åben og positiv omgangstone, hvor høj faglighed og specialistfokus vægtes højt; der er højt til loftet, plads til personlighed, diversitet og frem for alt udvikling af det enkelte individ, således at Garmin til enhver tid, og på alle områder, fremstår som ”state-of-the-art”, for alle, internt som eksternt.  Vi brænder for det, vi laver, og har et fantastisk godt samarbejde internt med kollegaer i Danmark og i udlandet.  Stillingen er på fuld tid og indbefatter lønpakke med pensionsordning, sundhedsforsikring, 1 sportstime om ugen i arbejdstiden, kantineordning, personalerabat og flere andre personalegoder.  Kontoret er placeret i Allerød med adgang til offentlig transport.  Kontakt  Søg jobbet ved at sende din ansøgning og CV senest 30-11-2023 . Vær opmærksom på, at vi behandler ansøgninger løbende, og stillingen derfor kan blive besat inden den givne dato.  Ved spørgsmål om rollen kan du kontakte bjorn.hundewadt@garmin.com .  Jobbet søges via QuickApply på Jobindex. title: Senior Software Engineer
company: Brinch & Partners søger for Zenegy ApS
description: Skip to content      Søg efter:    Forside Team Stillinger Rekruttering International Referencer Kontakt DK  Dansk English  Forside Team Stillinger Rekruttering International Referencer Kontakt DK  Dansk English Senior Software Engineer Zenegy, 12.607 Hjem » 12.607 Senior Software Engineer, Zenegy  12.607 Senior Software Engineer, Zenegy Jens Christian Jensen 2023-09-11T10:57:52+02:00 Zenegy Zenegy Senior Software Engineer – Payroll, Expenses, and Finance Join Zenegy and be part of our journey to redefine payroll, expenses, and finance software. Your expertise and passion will drive our mission to provide innovative solutions to organizations worldwide . Are you an experienced and talented software engineer looking for an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in the payroll, expenses, and finance domain? Join our dynamic software company as a Senior Software Engineer and contribute to the development of our innovative, robust and scalable solutions. As a key member of our team, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing Software solutions that empower organizations in managing their financial operations efficiently. At Zenegy, we disrupt traditional payroll and financial software. We operate on an open platform of innovation, integration, and user-friendliness, and we are growing rapidly. To support our growth, we are currently seeking talented and passionate colleagues for our headquarters in Hørsholm. You will be part of a professional and dedicated team with many exciting profiles. We highly value culture and community, and we mean it when we say that work should be fun. ”Zenegy is the ideal workplace for software engineers who are immersed in the Microsoft tech stack. This encompasses cutting-edge, legacy-free products built on Azure with .NET Core.” Says Yannik, Technical Lead. Role and Responsibilities: As a Senior Software Engineer at Zenegy, you will: Utilize your strong experience in backend development using .NET, .NET Core, and C#. Proficiently build .NET Core web APIs and work with RESTful APIs, gRPC, and SignalR. Apply your solid understanding of Docker and experience with containerized deployments. Leverage your extensive knowledge of Azure, including AppServices, Functions, Service Bus, Logic Apps, Application Insights, and Redis Cache. Work with MS SQL Server and Cosmos DB for data storage. Utilize Azure DevOps for source control, CI/CD, and project management. Focus on non-functional requirements, ensuring the development of high-quality and scalable solutions. Desired Additional Skills and Experience: In addition to the core requirements, we value the following skills and experience: Understanding of Enterprise Architecture principles, with a keen interest in software architecture. Experience in designing, maintaining, and optimizing large-scale SQL Server databases. Knowledge of Machine Learning and AI concepts, enabling integration of intelligent features into our solutions. Proficiency in frontend development using Angular for building user-friendly interfaces. Familiarity with mobile development using Xamarin Forms or .NET MAUI. Experience with payroll, banking, payments, expense management, or accounting software (not required but highly desirable). ”Zenegy is a fast growing new player in the market that challenge status quo when it comes to financial software. Our platform is cloud based and fully API enabled providing us the ability to provide true modular solution that easily integrates. It’s one product or the full suite – according to need.” Says Katrine, CTO at Zenegy.  Why Join Us: Collaborative and Innovative Environment: Work with a talented team of professionals in a collaborative and innovative environment. Impactful Projects: Engage in challenging projects that have a direct impact on the financial operations of organizations. Cutting-edge Technologies: Access to cutting-edge technologies and tools to enhance your skillset. Competitive Compensation: Compensation and benefits according to qualifications. Professional and Personal Growth: Professional growth and career development opportunities. Remote Work Flexibility: Enjoy the flexibility to work from the comfort of your home, a few days a week. Work/Life Balance: Maintain a healthy work/life balance. Social Environment: Be part of a good social environment with social events. How to Apply: Read more about Zenegy at www.zenegy.com , The application and selection process will be done in collaboration with Brinch & Partners. If you would like to know more about this opportunity and Zenegy, please feel free to contact Partner Jens Christian Jensen by telephone +45 2784 7405. In order to apply for the job, use the “Apply” option below. We look forward to receiving your application and CV as soon as possible. We appreciate all applications, but only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps. All inquiries will be treated confidentially. Location: Hørsholm, Denmark (Remote work flexibility available) Note: Relocation assistance is not provided by the company. Apply Jens Christian Jensen Partner +45 2784 7405  jc@brinchpartners.dk Tweet Share Share Tweet Share Share BRINCH & PARTNERS Hos Brinch & Partners leverer vi professionel og kompromisløs rekruttering af specialister og ledere. Vi lever af at finde og vurdere mennesker og er en naturlig sparringspartner for din virksomhed, hvis du ønsker at drøfte emner som Search & Selection og HR Consulting. Vi er en landsdækkende virksomhed med kontorer i København og Århus. Kandidatdatabase Vi løser en række af vores rekrutterings-opgaver uden brug af annoncering. Som et væsentligt supplement til vores øvrige netværk og metoder bruger vi aktivt LinkedIn og vores database. title: Data Scientist med kendskab til Machine Learning og statistiske metoder
description: Data Scientist med kendskab til Machine Learning og statistiske metoder   I Team Enigma leverer vi prognoser til Energinets kontrolcenter, baseret på Data Science og Machine Learning. Det gør vores kontrolcenter i stand til at drive elnettet sikkert og effektivt. Vores opgave er både at drifte og vedligeholde eksisterende prognoser samt at udvikle nye. Det kræver kendskab til Machine Learning og statistiske metoder, men i lige så høj grad viden om de faktorer, som spiller ind i elmarkedet og transmissionsnettet.  Drift, vedligehold og udvikling af prognoser til kontrolcentret  Team Enigma består af både softwareudviklere og data scientists, der sammen har ansvaret for drift, vedligehold og udvikling af prognoser og af Machine Learning-baserede applikationer til Kontrolcenteret. En af de opgaver, vi kigger ind i netop nu, er at udvikle en forbedret vindkraftprognose. Her skal vi lave en model, som kan håndtere bl.a.:   Modellering af vindproduktion ud fra vejrudsigter og geografisk placering  Evt. forskellig modellering til nær-realtids og 24-timers horisont.  Inkorporering af planlagte udetider og markedsforhold, som gør at vindmøllerne slukkes  "Dag 0"-model som virker samme dag, nye vindmølleparker sættes i drift (ingen historisk træningsdata)   Du bliver en del af et tværgående og tværfagligt team med base i afdelingen Digitale Netprodukter. Vi arbejder i teamet efter Scrum-principperne og indgår´i et skaleret set-up i ART’en, Grid Operations (GridOp), sammen med fem andre teams.  Konkrete arbejdsopgaver omfatter:   Drift, vedligehold og optimering af eksisterende modeller  Udvikling og idriftsættelse af nye machine learning-baserede applikationer på vores platform i Azure  Opsætning af automatiserede data flows i Python og Databricks  Samarbejde med nøglepersoner omkring behov og løsninger   I Energinet står trivsel og fleksibilitet højt på dagsordenen. Du får derfor tilbudt udstyr til en god hjemmearbejdsplads for at kunne afveksle bedst muligt med at være på vores hovedkontor i Fredericia og hjemme.  Dataknuser med fokus på team-samarbejde  Du har en relevant videregående uddannelse og erhvervserfaring, hvor du fx har arbejdet med matematisk modellering, machine learning, statistik eller software-arkitektur.  Du har gerne et par års erfaring med en eller flere af disse:   Pogrammering af Machine Learning i Python  Datamodellering og -transformering  Drift af Machine Learning-modeller  Domænekendskab til elsystemet   Du ønsker at være en aktiv del af et team, der løser opgaver i fællesskab. Som person trives du med at samarbejde bredt i organisationen med nøglepersoner, der kan hjælpe teamet på vej – ligesom du er nysgerrig af natur og trives med mange forskellige typer opgaver.  Særlige forhold  Jobbet kræver, at du kan opnå og opretholde sikkerhedsgodkendelse.  Ansøgning og kontakt  Send din ansøgning med cv og andre relevante bilag via linket ”Ansøg” senest 3. december 2023 . Vi holder samtaler løbende og tillader os at lukke rekrutteringen før ansøgningsfristen, hvis vi finder den rette kandidat inden da. Har du spørgsmål til jobbet, er du meget velkommen til at kontakte afdelingsleder Irma Nezirevic på telefon 20 36 31 79.  Vi ser mangfoldighed som en styrke og opfordrer alle kvalificerede, uanset baggrund, til at søge jobbet. Vi arbejder aktivt og målrettet med mangfoldighed i Energinet og opfordrer dig derfor til at udelade billede, oplysninger om alder, civilstand og lignende, for at minimere ubevidste biases i processen. Du kan læse mere om vores mangfoldighedspolitik her.    Ansøg      OM ENERGINET   Selvstændig offentlig virksomhed  Ca. 1.800 ansatte  Hovedsæde i Fredericia  Øvrige lokationer i Ballerup, Egtved, Tjele, Vester Hassing, Stenlille og Lille Torup.   En fleksibel arbejdsplads - med en stærk vision  Glæd dig til at blive en del af en organisation med et meningsfuldt formål. Med visionen ”Grøn energi for en bedre verden” arbejder vi hver dag for, at vi når i mål med den grønne omstilling af energisystemet. Vi er nysgerrige, åbne og vægter samarbejde og inddragelse højt, samtidig med at vi har stort fokus på løbende udvikling og læring. I tråd med vores værdier ”mod” og ”tillid” er Energinet en fleksibel arbejdsplads, hvor du får stor indflydelse på, hvor og hvornår du løser dine arbejdsopgaver i en god balance mellem egne ønsker og værdiskabelsen for Energinet.  Læs mere om vores arbejdsplads    MEDARBEJDERFORDELE   Hos Energinet lægger vi vægt på at være en attraktiv arbejdsplads med stor fokus på trivsel, sundhed og et arbejdsliv i balance. Derfor tilbyder vi alle ansatte en række medarbejderfordele.  Læs mere om medarbejderfordelene          FÅ EN KORT INTRO TIL ENERGINETS OPGAVER             Vil du vide mere om os?  Læs vores virksomhedsprofil                Ansvarlig brug af dine oplysninger    ×     Jobindex ønsker at tilbyde en service, der giver dig den bedste oplevelse. Til dette ønsker vi at bruge cookies og personoplysninger til statistik og markedsføring. Vi indsamler oplysninger om din enhed, tidspunkt, besøgte sider og din IP-adresse. Jobindex bruger egne cookies og cookies fra samarbejdspartnere. Vi og vores samarbejdspartnere opbevarer og/eller tilgår oplysninger på din enhed med henblik på at vise tilpassede annoncer og annoncemåling, tilpasset indhold, indholdsmåling, målgruppeindsigter og produktudvikling.  Læs mere om Jobindex' brug af cookies og om vores behandling af personoplysninger .  Oplysningerne indsamles kun med dit samtykke, som til hver en tid kan ændres ved at klikke på " Cookiepolitik " nederst på siden. Head of AI Solutions           Application Deadline:  Ongoing          Workplace:  Hybrid Position          Location:    Bjerringbro, DK, 8850   Almere, NL, 1327 AE   Mölndal, SE, 43124   Oslo, NO, 596   Aartselaar, BE, 2630             Contract Type:  Full-Time          Working Hours:  37          Employment Type:  Regular                Would you like to steer the development and execution of the AI and data strategy of the company that is striving to make a positive impact on global water and climate challenges?  Become our new Head of AI Solutions and enable us to unlock the full potential of our IoT data and build an AI powered portfolio !    What is the job about?  As a Head of AI Solutions, you will ensure customer value creation for the Grundfos Business Divisions by leading the AI Solutions team of Data Engineers and Data Scientists to leverage data and AI technologies. This should be done in close collaboration with stakeholders from business and the other development units in the Global Technology and Innovation organization.   Your main responsibilities :   Leading the AI and data strategy development with the Grundfos Business Divisions to ensure cross-organizational alignment on data and AI in digital products and solutions;  Setting the direction for a team of AI Specialists, Lead data scientists, Chief Data Analysts, and Data Engineers while ensuring prioritization of their tasks;  Ensuring that stakeholders are aligned and onboard with the AI strategy and data strategy that has been devised;  Facilitating solid collaboration with other R&D functions at Grundfos and establishing effective cooperation in developing new products for AI and data strategies;  Ensuring that AI development is protected by filing industry-specific patents - both to secure new applications and to ensure that our development is not in breach of third-party IPR;  Establishing efficient data pipelines to effortlessly collect, process, and analyse data, which includes managing data connectors and integrations;  Securing real-time and batch data is used effectively to keep our insights up-to-date and accurate;  Leading the team in implementing cutting-edge machine learning techniques such as federated learning and transfer learning, as well as supervised, unsupervised, semi-supervised, and self-supervised learning for model training and in-depth data analysis. This includes the exploration of reinforcement learning for optimizing real-time decision-making.;  Leading the team in creating and overseeing digital twins used to simulate and analyse complex systems;  Making sure that the team makes use of leading technologies like deep neural networks (DNNs), convolutional neural networks (CNNs), and graph neural networks (GNNs) to address complex problems in data domains such as time series data, spatio-temporal data, image data, etc.;  Driving the adoption of ML/Ops practices to ensure the efficient deployment and management of AI models throughout its lifecycle.     Your background  We imagine that you have:   MSc in computer/data science or other relevant AI-related education.  More than 5 years of large-scale, hands-on experience with applied AI.  More than 10 years of relevant work experience in business leadership and digital solutions preferably in the water technology industry.  More than 5 years of experience in Leading and developing people.  Experience working in cross-functional teams.  Proven experience in project and change management.  Fluent in English verbal and written.     What’s in it for you?  You’ll be an invaluable part of our global leadership team, a diverse network of pioneers guiding others in seeing possibilities, not problems. You’ll be instrumental in spreading our optimistic, can-do attitude to advance global innovation and a clear sense of purpose, embodying our six core values , guiding our colleagues in living them day by day, and making a difference in global projects. We support you in navigating your own career and development path, offering you tools to hone your leadership craft, both within your field and to broaden your interest or expertise in areas such as diversity & inclusion, coaching and culture.    In addition, your day-to-day benefits include:   Diverse, inclusive environment with employee-led forums offering colleagues a safe place to connect and share openly  If you’ll be working from your home office, we’ll make sure you are well equipped with a good workstation. However, you are always welcome to our offices where you can engage, learn, and have fun with colleagues  On the top of it, flexible working hours and up to 3 days’ additional paid leave for volunteering  Annual bonuses, health insurance, parental support, internal well-being consultants and programmes  Access to the modern Grundfos Academy to pursue further both personal and professional development     Do you want to learn more?  If this job sounds appealing, please send your resume by clicking “Apply”.    To dig deeper into the Grundfos universe, follow us on LinkedIn or Youtube , and t o get to know some of your future colleagues and why they enjoy working at Grundfos, check out Meet our people    We look forward to hearing from you.            About Grundfos  Grundfos is one of the world’s leading water technology companies with more than 19.000 employees in 60+ countries all over the world. Our skills commit us to pioneering solutions to the world’s water and climate challenges and improve the quality of life for people. We dare to do things that others cannot or dare not do, as we believe innovation is not only a business opportunity, but an obligation. And what really matters to us is not short term profit, but the impact we make. By becoming part of our united powerful team, you too can drive this change no matter your role.  An inclusive team If you like the look of this job and know you can bring your skills to contribute to our purpose, please apply. We need and welcome professional people from all corners – however you identify and whatever your background is. title: Product Owner: Vær med til at drive datadrevet beslutningsstøtte og prognoser i Energinets kontrolcenter
description: Product Owner: Vær med til at drive datadrevet beslutningsstøtte og prognoser i Energinets kontrolcenter   Product Owner med fokus på product leadership  Integration af endnu mere vedvarende energi i elsystemet kræver udvikling af nye og eksisterende digitale løsninger, som skal understøtte kontrolcenteret med at overvåge, drifte og balancere elsystemet. Som vores nye Product Owner arbejder du i hjertet af det danske elnetsystem - og er med til at sørge for, at vi altid har strøm i stikkontakten, samtidig med at vi understøtter, at vi kommer på 100 % strøm fra vedvarende energi inden 2030.  I Energinet står trivsel og fleksibilitet højt på dagsordenen. Du får derfor tilbudt udstyr til en god hjemmearbejdsplads for at kunne afveksle bedst muligt med at være på vores hovedkontor i Fredericia og hjemme.  Ansvar for produktområde og tæt dialog med interessenter  Du bliver en del af afdelingen Digitale Netprodukter, hvor du får ansvar for et produktområde og de tilhørende systemer - og sammen med udviklingsteamet leverer løsninger til kontrolcenteret og andre, der understøtter dem i deres daglige arbejde med at drifte, overvåge og balancere elnettet – og således kan drive det danske elnet sikkert og effektivt.  Interessenthåndtering er en stor del af jobbet, da det er essentielt gennem tæt dialog og involvering at være tæt på og kende dine interessenter og deres behov. I samspil med dine kolleger får du ansvar for at:   opbygge backloggen samt definere og prioritere teamets aktiviteter i tæt samarbejde med de andre Product Owners, Product Manager, Epic Owners og Business Owners.  opbygge viden om dit produktområde, sikre dokumentation af forretningsprocesser og holde dig løbende opdateret med udviklingen inden for både forretningsdomænet og it-systemdomænet.  udarbejde features inden for produktområdet under devisen ”Just enough, just in time”   Vi bruger Scrum som udviklingsmetode og SAFe til at skalere på tværs - og vores agile produktteams er en del af ART’en ”Grid Operations”, hvis vision er at skabe en digital verden, der understøtter kontrolcentret i at drifte et flukturerende elsystem baseret på 100% vedvarende energi. Vores teams arbejder under princippet ”You build it, you own it”, hvilket betyder, at de både drifter og udvikler de løsninger, som de er ansvarlig for.  Du bliver Product Owner for Team Enigma  De team-medlemmer, som du vil møde, er en scrum master, en team-arkitekt samt et par softwareudviklere og data scien-tists. Som produktejer får du ansvar for de egenudviklede applikationer i kontrolcenteret, der baserer sig på Data Science og Machine Learning. Det drejer sig især om prognoser, f.eks. vindkraft som baserer sig på vejrudsigter og produktions-/forbrugsmålinger i elnettet.  Din rolle bliver at sætte retning – i tæt dialog med interessenterne – for at kontrolcenteret kan arbejde med datadrevet beslutningsstøtte og indføre endnu flere relevante prognoser og advanced analytics. Alt dette ved at tænke nyt og ud af boksen, stille spørgsmål ved ”plejer”, inddrage innovative teknologier og metoder samt sikre, at Data Science og software-udvikling går op i en højere enhed..  Erfaren profil med et par års erfaring i Product Owner-rollen  Du har god erfaring som Product Owner og har prøvet at arbejde i en agil organisation, hvor din fokus har været på at sætte retning og skabe følgeskab omkring dine produkter. Da de produkter, du arbejder med, baserer sig på Machine Learning og Data Science, er det fordel at have indsigt i disse områder. Derudover er det en fordel at have forståelse for energisektoren og de data, der kan bruges til at understøtte driften af det danske elnet. Dette er dog ikke et krav. Så længe du har viljen og engagementet til at lære det nødvendige, sikrer vi, at du får den relevante domæneviden, der skal til for at lykkes i din rolle.  I tillæg er du dygtig i mundtlig og skriftlig kommunikation, både på dansk og engelsk. Dit mindset er kendetegnet ved faglig stolthed, nysgerrighed og øje på, at vi leverer det rigtige - som giver mest værdi for kunden.  Som person er du god til at skabe relationer. Samtidig er du hurtigopfattende og har en positiv indstilling med fokus på at finde vejen fra behov til løsning - både på operationelt og strategisk niveau. Du har en vedholdende og struktureret ar-bejdsform og evner at have og skabe overblik. Samtidig er du god til at planlægge og koordinere egen og andres arbejds-indsats og kan håndtere mange sideløbende opgaver, som du afslutter og bringer i mål.  Ansøgning og kontakt  Send din ansøgning med cv og andre relevante bilag via linket ”Ansøg” senest 30. november . Vi holder samtaler løben-de og tillader os at lukke rekrutteringen før ansøgningsfristen, hvis vi finder den rette kandidat inden da. Har du spørgs-mål til jobbet, er du meget velkommen til at kontakte afdelingsleder Irma Nezirevic på telefon 20 36 31 79.  Vi ser mangfoldighed som en styrke og opfordrer alle kvalificerede, uanset baggrund, til at søge jobbet. Vi arbejder aktivt og målrettet med mangfoldighed i Energinet og opfordrer dig derfor til at udelade billede, oplysninger om alder, civilstand og lignende, for at minimere ubevidste biases i processen. Du kan læse mere om vores mangfoldighedspolitik her.    Ansøg      OM ENERGINET   Selvstændig offentlig virksomhed  Ca. 1.800 ansatte  Hovedsæde i Fredericia  Øvrige lokationer i Ballerup, Egtved, Tjele, Vester Hassing, Stenlille og Lille Torup.   En fleksibel arbejdsplads - med en stærk vision  Glæd dig til at blive en del af en organisation med et meningsfuldt formål. Med visionen ”Grøn energi for en bedre verden” arbejder vi hver dag for, at vi når i mål med den grønne omstilling af energisystemet. Vi er nysgerrige, åbne og vægter samarbejde og inddragelse højt, samtidig med at vi har stort fokus på løbende udvikling og læring. I tråd med vores værdier ”mod” og ”tillid” er Energinet en fleksibel arbejdsplads, hvor du får stor indflydelse på, hvor og hvornår du løser dine arbejdsopgaver i en god balance mellem egne ønsker og værdiskabelsen for Energinet.  Læs mere om vores arbejdsplads    MEDARBEJDERFORDELE   Hos Energinet lægger vi vægt på at være en attraktiv arbejdsplads med stor fokus på trivsel, sundhed og et arbejdsliv i balance. Derfor tilbyder vi alle ansatte en række medarbejderfordele.  Læs mere om medarbejderfordelene          FÅ EN KORT INTRO TIL ENERGINETS OPGAVER             Vil du vide mere om os?  Læs vores virksomhedsprofil                Ansvarlig brug af dine oplysninger    ×     Jobindex ønsker at tilbyde en service, der giver dig den bedste oplevelse. Til dette ønsker vi at bruge cookies og personoplysninger til statistik og markedsføring. Vi indsamler oplysninger om din enhed, tidspunkt, besøgte sider og din IP-adresse. Jobindex bruger egne cookies og cookies fra samarbejdspartnere. Vi og vores samarbejdspartnere opbevarer og/eller tilgår oplysninger på din enhed med henblik på at vise tilpassede annoncer og annoncemåling, tilpasset indhold, indholdsmåling, målgruppeindsigter og produktudvikling.  Læs mere om Jobindex' brug af cookies og om vores behandling af personoplysninger .  Oplysningerne indsamles kun med dit samtykke, som til hver en tid kan ændres ved at klikke på " Cookiepolitik " nederst på siden. title: Erfaren Data scientist til team eBonds AI Research med fokus på data, modellering og IT
description:
Vi bruger cookies  Jyske Bank registrerer oplysninger om dig, når du bruger vores hjemmesider. Vi bruger vores egne cookies og cookies fra tredjeparter til følgende formål:   Til at understøtte hjemmesidens funktioner  (f.eks. valg af sprog i netbanken)  Til at lave analyser og statistik, så vi kan forbedre hjemmesiden  Til at profilere din adfærd, så vi kan levere målrettet markedsføring til dig   Hvis du vil vide mere om disse formål, så tryk på ”Vis detaljer”. Du kan til enhver tid ændre eller tilbagekalde dit samtykke via linket "Cookies" nederst på siden.  Mere om, hvordan vi bruger cookies   Vis detaljer  Skjul detaljer          Nødvendige   Nødvendige cookies hjælper med at gøre en hjemmeside brugbar ved at aktivere grundlæggende funktioner, såsom side-navigation og adgang til sikre områder af hjemmesiden. Hjemmesiden kan ikke fungere uden disse cookies.       Navn:  AWSALBCORS    Udbyder:  execution-ci360.jyskebank.dk    Formål:  Understøtter websitets tekniske funktioner. Udløb:  15 minutter          Afvis cookies  Opdater samtykke  Tillad cookies         Nødvendige        Statistiske        Marketing           Sådan bruger Jyske Bank-koncernen cookies   Dit samtykke gælder for følgende domæner:  jyskebank.dk, chat.jyskebank.dk, webinar.jyskebank.dk, kunde.jyskebank.dk, auth.jyskebank.dk, svar.jyskebank.dk, jyskebank.leadfamly.com, portal.erhverv.jyskebank.dk, portal.jyskebank.dk, jb.jyskebank.dk, web.jyskebank.dk  Cookiedeklarationen er sidst opdateret d. 24.11.2023      Jyske Bank-koncernen ønsker at tilbyde dig relevant indhold på vores digitale platforme. Derfor anvender vi cookies og lignende teknologier til at indsamle oplysninger om dig, og hvordan du og andre besøgende bruger vores digitale platforme. Nedenfor vil vi gerne fortælle dig, hvordan vi anvender cookies, og hvordan vi bruger dine oplysninger, så du kan vurdere, om du vil give samtykke. Vi fortæller også, hvordan du kan ændre dine valg og forhindre brugen af dine oplysninger.  Som bruger af Jyske Bank-koncernens primære digitale platforme bestemmer du som udgangspunkt selv, hvilke typer cookies du tillader. Undtagelsen er nødvendige cookies.  Hvad er en cookie?  En cookie er en tekstfil, der bliver gemt i din browser, som gør, at vi kan genkende din computer, tablet eller mobiltelefon fra besøg til besøg. Når vi bruger ordet ”cookie”, så dækker det både egentlige cookies, og lignende teknologier, der gemmer data i dine browsere og apps.  Cookies kan ikke indeholde virus eller skadelige programmer.  Er jeg anonym?  De oplysninger, vi registrerer vha. cookies, er som udgangspunkt anonyme. Vi kan kun genkende dig, hvis du indtaster eller tidligere har indtastet oplysninger som fx e-mailadresse eller mobilnummer i en formular, eller hvis du logger ind i vores digitale løsninger.  Uanset om du som bruger af Jyske Bank-koncernens hjemmesider er anonym eller genkendt, bruger vi cookies til at binde dine besøg på vores platforme sammen.  Formålet er at forbedre din brugeroplevelse, at understøtte vores markedsføring samt gøre hjemmesider, netbanker, apps og øvrig kommunikation mere relevant for dig.  Hvordan afviser jeg cookies?  Når du bruger vores digitale platforme, kan du vælge at afvise alle cookies, bortset fra nødvendige cookies. Du kan til enhver tid ændre eller tilbagekalde dit samtykke via linket "Cookies" nederst på hjemmesiden.  Hvis du helt eller delvist trækker dit samtykke tilbage, holder vi omgående op med at anvende de berørte cookies.  Hvordan sletter jeg cookies?  Cookies du tidligere har accepteret, kan du sagtens slette fra din browser. Hvordan du sletter disse afhænger af den browser du bruger (Chrome, Firefox, Safari etc.) og på hvilken enhed (mobil, tablet, pc, mac).  I de fleste browsere kan du klikke på hængelåsikonet til venstre for webadressen for at se og slette cookies, men det kan variere fra browser til browser.  Tredjepartscookies  Nogle af de markedsføringscookies vi anvender, ejes af tredjeparter, som hjælper os med at formidle relevante markedsføringsbudskaber, når du anvender deres digitale platforme. Det gælder eksempelvis Facebook.  Tredjeparterne kan bruge de oplysninger, som deres cookies indsamler om dig til deres egne, lovlige formål, og hvis du accepterer disse markedsføringscookies, accepterer du samtidig, at det er tredjepartens retningslinjer for anvendelse af cookies og personoplysninger, som finder anvendelse.  Hvilke cookies bruges på denne hjemmeside?  Under cookie-indstillinger kan du vælge "Vis detaljer" og se, hvilke overordnede kategorier af cookies vi bruger. For hver kategori kan du se oplysninger om de konkrete cookies, du modtager ved brug af denne hjemmeside. And do you see yourself using your experience in Danske Bank’s newly established Group Data & Analytics team reporting to the Group Chief Data Officer ? Our team Our team is the Group Data & Analytics function for Danske Bank working with each of the businesses to accelerate the adoption of data and utilise analytics and data science to enhance our products and services to our clients. The Group Data & Analytics team consists of Data Management, Data Platform,  Analytics Centre of Excellence,  Data Programme delivery, Business Intelligence and Data Governance. Data & Analytics is one of the central enablers identified as a priority by Dankse Bank’s Executive Leadership Team (ELT) with significant mandate and support. What you will be responsible for The Head of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence will be responsible for leading the Data Science and Artificial Intelligence activity, developing the framework and standardisation for enhancing our data science, machine learning and advanced analytics practices.   This role will work collaboratively with analytics practices across the bank the develop and execute use cases which generate business benefits. What you bring We imagine that you have extensive experience as a recognised leader in Data Science, Artificial Intelligence and Advanced Analytics. -You are an expert in developing data analytics solutions, and with a strong desire to deliver on the mission and goals of the business. You value feedback, received as well as given as a way for you and the members to grow and learn. You appreciate a fast-paced environment where you bring your extensive experience with Data transformation Furthermore, you bring: Leader in Machine Learning and Data Science Techniques Proven thought leader in the space of ML, DS (AI) and Advanced analytics Proven Experience in delivery of ML and analytics use cases in a Banking context Experience in establishing Data Labs, AI, Analytics and Machine Learning Centre of Excellence in  European Banks Banking background Track record of delivering Banking data science, Machine Learning (AI) and analytics use cases We offer: An exciting job, where the tone is informal, and the form of collaboration is characterised by trust and helpfulness. The opportunity to work together with committed and skilled colleagues with the room to experiment and grow together as a team, and exciting opportunities to learn and grow personally and professionally. An important part of your job is stakeholder management, and you will gain an extensive network across the Danske Bank Group. Have we caught your attention? For additional information about the position, please contact Niresh Rajah at nirr@danskebank.dk . We will conduct interviews continuously, so we encourage you to apply as early as possible! Fascinated by 3D, cloud and machine learning? Love working with cutting-edge tools, on a blank canvas, and in unconstrained environments? Want to play a leading role as H3D grows from a profitable startup to an iconic scaleup?  We are looking for an ambitious 3D Developer who gets excited by these questions! You will report directly to the R&D Director and shape the DNA of our company.  Location: EU (Copenhagen or Dublin area preferred)  About H3D  H3D is an Australian Ph.D. research spinout whose mission is to make custom-fit devices (e.g. hearing aids, dental appliances) accessible to everyday people. We do this by providing AI technology to audio and dental labs – our Dental CAD , Audio CAD and Smartphone Scanning products – to grow their businesses and better support patients.  Since our product launch in 2021, H3D are growing fast and working with industry leaders such as Logitech, GN Resound, Modern Dental Group and many others. The company is backed by leading VC investors and has customers based worldwide.  What You’ll Do  Outcomes you’ll deliver:   Research, write, and document algorithms in Python/C++ that perform specific processes on raw 3D data.  Research and develop machine learning algorithms to improve the systems, we mainly work with PyTorch.  Write regression tests to ensure functioning outputs from our systems.  Work with product management to plan feature requests from customers  Give opinions and help drive the technical product roadmap   Who You Are  Must-Have Experience:   3+ years of Python development  Knowledge of 3D data processing  3D creation/altering/manipulation of 3d surfaces and objects   Nice-To-Have Experience:   C++ programming  3D Design using Blender  Working with Git, Docker, and AWS Lambda   Our Culture   Mission Driven: we value the social impact our work drives.  Balanced + Fun Loving: we value our lives outside of work, as we’re a collective of dedicated family members, surfers, rock climbers, musicians, travellers, and more.  Quick Movers: we value getting things done, with a bias for action.  Autonomy and Empowerment: we value independence and ownership.  Embrace Challenges: we value resourcefulness, facing ambiguity with comfort.   The Benefits   Impactful Work : your work will benefit patients and humanity at large, and you will gain a unique career experience.  Generous Remuneration : we value working with the best, and we remunerate accordingly. This includes valuable equity options.  Remote First + Flexible : we enjoy the liberty of living where we want and working when we want, with teammates spanning Ireland, Denmark, Ukraine, France, and Australia. Fascinated by 3D, cloud and machine learning? Love working with cutting-edge tools, on a blank canvas, and in unconstrained environments? Want to play a leading role as H3D grows from a profitable startup to an iconic scaleup?  We are looking for an ambitious Full Stack Developer who gets excited by these questions! You will report directly to the R&D Director and shape the DNA of our company.  Location: EU (Copenhagen area preferred)  About H3D  H3D is an Australian Ph.D. research spinout whose mission is to make custom-fit devices (e.g. hearing aids, dental appliances) accessible to everyday people. We do this by providing AI technology to audio and dental labs – our Dental CAD, Audio CAD and Smartphone Scanning products – to grow their businesses and better support patients.  Since our product launch in 2021, H3D are growing fast and working with industry leaders such as Logitech, GN Resound, Modern Dental Group and many others. The company is backed by leading VC investors and has customers based worldwide.  What You’ll Do  Outcomes you’ll deliver:   Assist in the development and deployment of web apps hosted on AWS, using common frameworks such as VueJS, Flask, etc.  Solve complex AWS cloud architecture to deliver reliable and efficient services to both web applications and iOS apps.  Help to improve our build and deployment processes to make iterations more efficient. We are fully AWS-hosted and use a range of tools, including ECS and Docker.  Collaborate with our product managers and customers to design, build and integrate new features into our systems.  Write both unit and integration tests.  Establish, maintain and document multiple API systems.   Who You Are  Must-Have Experience:   2-5+ years as a professional full-stack software developer  Language required = Javascript (VueJS, ReactJS, etc) and Python, with a demonstratable portfolio  Deployed and/or maintained at least 1 web-hosted app  Working with APIs (REST/GraphQL)   Nice-To-Have Experience:   Design and deployment of AWS cloud services (AWS ElasticBeanstalk, AWS S3, AWS Lambda, AWS Batch, etc)  Processing 3D data – e.g. visualizing 3D models in a web browser  Designing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines  Developing iOS applications or knowledge of Swift programming   Our Culture   Mission Driven: we value the social impact our work drives.  Balanced + Fun Loving: we value our lives outside of work, as we’re a collective of dedicated family members, surfers, gamers, rock climbers, musicians, historians, travellers, and more.  Quick Movers: we value getting things done, with a bias for action.  Autonomy and Empowerment: we value independence and ownership.  Embrace Challenges: we value resourcefulness, and facing ambiguity with comfort.   The Benefits  Impactful Work : your work will benefit patients and humanity at large, and you will gain a unique career experience.  Generous Remuneration : we value working with the best, and we remunerate accordingly. This includes valuable equity options.  Remote First + Flexible : we enjoy the liberty of living where we want and working when we want, with teammates spanning Ireland, Denmark, Ukraine, France, and Australia. description: 31.300 job i dag         For jobsøgere    For arbejdsgivere     DA    EN          Log ind  Opret profil                Jobsøgning       Søg job Vælg mellem flere søgekriterier    Din side Skab overblik over din jobsøgning      Jobagent Få nye job direkte i din indbakke    CV Opret dit CV og bliv headhuntet      QuickApply-profil Søg jobbet nemt fra mobilen    Jobannoncearkiv Find inspiration i udløbne jobopslag      Få en jobvejleder Bliv afklaret i din jobsøgning    Jobs For Ukraine Hjælper ukrainske flygtninge med at få job        Arbejdspladser       Se virksomhedsprofiler Få viden om din næste arbejdsplads      Evaluér arbejdsplads Hvordan er din arbejdsplads? Stresstest Mål dit stressniveau      Talenttest Find dine arbejdstalenter        Guides       Ansøgninger Sådan skriver du en god ansøgning    CV Få de bedste tips til dit CV      Jobsamtale Gør et godt indtryk til samtalen    Lønforhandling Stå stærkt til lønforhandlingen      Opsigelse Brug denne guide og kom godt videre    Uopfordret ansøgning Sådan søger du uopfordret      Dit første job Værktøjer og tips til dit nye arbejdsliv    Jobglæde Sæt jobglæde på agendaen        Kurser       6 ugers jobrettet uddannelse Opgrader dine kompetencer      Jobsøgningskursus Skab struktur i din jobsøgning              For arbejdsgivere    Tilmeld dig Jobindex    Switch to English        Log ind  Opret profil                    Søg job       Gemte job       Jobagent       Mere     Overblik   Ansøgninger   Henvendelser   CV   QuickApply-profil   Virksomheder   Råd og vejledning   Indstillinger          Save  Share  Apply        Novo Nordisk A/S    2880 Bagsværd     Share    Save     Validation Lead - Digital Quality    Category: Quality  Are you passionate about quality assurance for digital solutions? Would you find it interesting to develop and define our best practices for validation of digital solutions and IT infrastructure, bringing your innovative spirit to our organization? Then you could be our new colleague - read more and apply!  The position You will be validation lead on projects of varying sizes as well as helping and advising other projects on how to ensure that our digital solutions covering apps, dashboards, as well as machine learning tools are all in compliance.  Your daily tasks and responsibilities will be to: •    Lead compliance activities on projects as responsible for the end-to-end quality and compliance for our digital initiatives •    Work collaboratively across functions with stakeholders and vendors to plan, coordinate and execute IT system and infrastructure validation activities •    Perform risk-based validation of GxP systems and infrastructure to ensure requirements coverage and develop validation documents in accordance with corporate procedures •    Have the ownership for the development and delivery of complete validation packages •    Facilitate verification and validation activities including automated testing, documentation review and approval  Finally, you will also be in charge of training colleagues in GXP and validation.  You will be the interface between the IT QA organisation and our digital developers ensuring that we follow best practices for qualification and validation. You will also feedback learnings and suggestions on how to improve the validation process.  Qualifications For this position, we are looking for someone that has worked with the guidelines provided by the global regulatory and authority agencies such as FDA, EMA and MHRA, in areas such as GxP, FDA 21CFR part 11 and GAMP Annex11.  To succeed in this role, you: •    have a Master’s degree in a relevant subject or a Bachelors’ with extensive experience •    have some years of experience with IT validation in a GMP regulated environment •    have experience within pharmaceutical Quality Management, have taken part of GxP system and/or infrastructure qualification and validation •    are fully proficient in English  Also experience or interest within Azure DevOps, software development and scripted/automated testing is going to be considered an advantage.  As a person, you are team-oriented, self-driven, proactive, and responsible. You are willing to bring your thoughts out in the open, creating a healthy discussion, and at the same time, setting a direction, giving and receiving feedback. You are looking forward to challenging the business processes by also collaborating closely with stakeholders, ready to operate in an environment that is subjected to frequent changes.  About the department In Novo Nordisk Digital Quality we are responsible for driving Innovation and Digital transformation across the Global Novo Nordisk Quality Organisation. We consist of a central team - that is responsible for strategy, follow up and support - and two departments: Process Digitalisation & Quality Data & Insights.  Process Digitalisation is responsible for making Digital Products that makes our Quality processes simpler and more effective. We have a tech stack that ranges from No-code/low-code to full stack. Quality Data & Insights are responsible for Data management of Quality owned data and providing valuable insights on Quality performance in an effective way to all levels in the organisation.  Our area is a group of engaged and highly skilled colleagues based at Novo Nordisk headquarters in Bagsværd, Denmark and our Global Service Center in India.  Working at Novo Nordisk At Novo Nordisk, we don’t wait for change. We drive it. We’re a dynamic company in an even more dynamic industry, and we know that what got us to where we are today is not necessarily what will make us successful in the future. We embrace the spirit of experimentation, striving for excellence without fixating on perfection. We never shy away from opportunities to develop, we seize them. From research and development, through to manufacturing, marketing and sales – we’re all working to move the needle on patient care.  Contact For further information, please contact Gustav Lind at gsl@novonordisk.com  Deadline 10 December 2023  Please note that interviews will be scheduled as soon as the ideal candidate is identified, so we encourage you to apply sooner rather than later.  You do not need to attach a cover letter to your application, but please include a few sentences about why you are applying in your resume or CV. To ensure an efficient and fair recruitment process, please refrain from adding a photo in your CV.  We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.  At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing. Data Processor:     Purpose:     Data Processor Privacy Policy:      Expiry:  a year    Name:  cf_clearance    Provider:  .insights.thehub.io            Your consent applies to the following domains:  insights.thehub.io, hubtest.io, thehub.io    Cookie declaration last updated on 08.11.2023     Please read our cookie and privacy policy   What is a cookie?  A cookie is a small datafile that is saved on your computer, tablet or mobile phone. A cookie is not a program that can contain harmful programs or viruses.  How/why the homepage uses cookies  Cookies are necessary for the homepage to function. Cookies help us get an overview of your visit to the homepage so that we can continually optimise and adjust the homepage to your requirements and interests. For example, cookies remember what you might have added to a shopping cart, if you have previously visited the page, if you are logged in and what languages and currency you want displayed on the homepage. We also use cookies to target our ads to you on other homepages. On a very general level, cookies are used as part of our services in order to show content that is as relevant as possible to you.  How long are cookies saved?  How long cookies are saved on your device can vary. The time when they are scheduled to expire is calculated from the last date you visited the homepage. When cookies expire, they are automatically deleted. You can view a complete list of cookies below.  This is how you can reject or delete your cookies  You can always reject cookies on your computer, tablet or phone by changing your browser settings. Where these settings can be found depends on the type of browser you are using. If you do change the settings, please be aware that there will be some functions and services that you cannot use because they rely on the homepage being able to remember the choices you have made. You can choose to not receive cookies from Google Analytics here .   Deleting cookies  You can delete cookies that you have previously accepted. If you are using a PC with a recent version of a browser, you can delete your cookies by using these shortcut keys: CTRL + SHIFT + Delete.  If the shortcut keys do not work and/or you are using an Apple computer, you must find out what browser you are using and then click on the relevant link:   Internet Explorer  Microsoft Edge  Mozilla Firefox  Google Chrome  Opera  Safari  Flash cookies  Apple  Android  Windows 7   Remember: If you are using several different browsers, you must delete the cookies in all of them.  Do you have any questions?  Should you have any questions or comments in connection with this information and/or our processing of personal data, you are welcome to get in touch with us. The cookie declaration itself is updated every month via Cookie Information . If you have any questions regarding the Cookie Information, you can send an email to info@cookieinformation.com. Senior Machine Learning Engineer  Unumed  Copenhagen  Full-time   Salary Competitive     Senior Machine Learning Engineer  Unumed believes in a world where technology allows scarce healthcare resources to reach more patients with better care. To realize this vision, we developed Unumed HMS, a smart Hospital Management System based on a modern cloud native architecture. Unumed HMS is already being used to manage 30+ hospitals in 6 different countries in Africa and Asia, and we are planning an expansion to many other markets (including Europe). We are seeking a seasoned Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI and Data team. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in the development and implementation of AI algorithms and business intelligence solutions, that use the extensive clinical and financial data collected in our system to revolutionize how healthcare resources are utilized and patient care is delivered. Your main focus will be in our medical imaging initiative where, in collaboration with the AI Centre at the University of Copenhagen and radiologists from Rigshospitalet, we are building an AI decision support system for chest x-ray analysis. This system aims to assist radiologists by optimizing workflows and enhancing diagnostic precision. Your expertise will drive innovation, transforming medical imaging and improving healthcare delivery.  About the position  Our AI and Data team is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to build, deploy and scale the next generation of intelligent features in our hospital management system. You will be reporting to Marco, our Chief Data Officer, and will work closely with the broader engineering organization both on the x-ray project and on other ML/data-related features in Unumed HMS. Your main responsibilities will be: Be in charge of our MLOps, focusing on reproducibility, testability and seamless model deployment Improve our ML models and training infrastructure to allow for faster experimentation Build our model monitoring infrastructure Build and maintain internal tools that facilitate data labelling and data analysis Extend and scale the analytics and business intelligence functionalities in Unumed HMS Project manage the delivery of research with the University of Copenhagen  Ideally, you bring the following technical skills...  Expert knowledge of the Python programming language Strong software development skills (including git, testing frameworks, documentation) Proven track record of conceptualizing, building, and deploying machine learning applications to address real-world challenges Proficiency in MLOps pipelines and CI/CD tools (e.g. mlflow, jenkins) Experience with at least one deep learning framework (e.g. PyTorch, Tensorflow) Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure Hands-on experience with Docker Familiarity with Python’s data science stack (numpy, pandas, duckdb, ..) Knowledge of relational/non-relational databases  As a person, you…  Have 4+ years of experience working as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role Have university degree in computer science or machine learning Are structured and able to prioritize multiple projects Have willingness and demonstrated ability to learn about new technologies and industries Bring a positive attitude and new perspective Are a skilled communicator  Join us  We encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply, so please reach out even if you believe you only cover 70% of the requirements. You will have ample opportunities to learn the rest! The position is full-time and starts as soon as possible. We offer a competitive salary and company benefits. We have an office in the city center of Copenhagen and follow a hybrid work model with flexible working hours. Want to have a life-changing impact and join the team that is empowering the human in healthcare? Click the 'Apply' button!   For more information or questions please contact us at  mf@unumed.com   Perks and benefits  This job comes with several perks and benefits   Free coffee / tea  Get your caffeine fix to get you started and keep you going.  Near public transit  Easy access and treehugger friendly workplace.  Free office snacks  Peckish after lunch? We got your back with soft drinks, treats and fruit.  Central office  Your local office is your anchor point, thus, we placed it centrally at your convenience.  Paid holiday  Metropolitists, beach boys and mountaineers we salute you and pay you to go and explore the world.  Flexible working hours  Time is precious. Make it count. Morning person or night owl, this job is for you.  See all 13 benefits  Working at Unumed  See company profile  Unumed believes in a world where technology supports, enables, and empowers the human in healthcare. To bring about this vision, we developed a smart Hospital Management System based on a next generation innovative scalable software platform.

Headquartered in Copenhagen, with offices in various countries, we empower hospitals, healthcare professionals, and patients in Africa and Asia, allowing scarce healthcare resources to reach more patients with better care. Data Processor:     Purpose:     Data Processor Privacy Policy:      Expiry:  a year    Name:  cf_clearance    Provider:  .insights.thehub.io            Your consent applies to the following domains:  insights.thehub.io, hubtest.io, thehub.io    Cookie declaration last updated on 08.11.2023     Please read our cookie and privacy policy   What is a cookie?  A cookie is a small datafile that is saved on your computer, tablet or mobile phone. A cookie is not a program that can contain harmful programs or viruses.  How/why the homepage uses cookies  Cookies are necessary for the homepage to function. Cookies help us get an overview of your visit to the homepage so that we can continually optimise and adjust the homepage to your requirements and interests. For example, cookies remember what you might have added to a shopping cart, if you have previously visited the page, if you are logged in and what languages and currency you want displayed on the homepage. We also use cookies to target our ads to you on other homepages. On a very general level, cookies are used as part of our services in order to show content that is as relevant as possible to you.  How long are cookies saved?  How long cookies are saved on your device can vary. The time when they are scheduled to expire is calculated from the last date you visited the homepage. When cookies expire, they are automatically deleted. You can view a complete list of cookies below.  This is how you can reject or delete your cookies  You can always reject cookies on your computer, tablet or phone by changing your browser settings. Where these settings can be found depends on the type of browser you are using. If you do change the settings, please be aware that there will be some functions and services that you cannot use because they rely on the homepage being able to remember the choices you have made. You can choose to not receive cookies from Google Analytics here .   Deleting cookies  You can delete cookies that you have previously accepted. If you are using a PC with a recent version of a browser, you can delete your cookies by using these shortcut keys: CTRL + SHIFT + Delete.  If the shortcut keys do not work and/or you are using an Apple computer, you must find out what browser you are using and then click on the relevant link:   Internet Explorer  Microsoft Edge  Mozilla Firefox  Google Chrome  Opera  Safari  Flash cookies  Apple  Android  Windows 7   Remember: If you are using several different browsers, you must delete the cookies in all of them.  Do you have any questions?  Should you have any questions or comments in connection with this information and/or our processing of personal data, you are welcome to get in touch with us. The cookie declaration itself is updated every month via Cookie Information . If you have any questions regarding the Cookie Information, you can send an email to info@cookieinformation.com.      Powered By: Cookie Information  Save settings                                                Find jobs Browse startups News & Insights Pricing For startups  Sign up  Log in     🤖 CYBER MONDAY 🤖 Get 20% off on PRO job ads today . Use promo code CYBERMONDAY20 during checkout to
    unlock.       Full Stack Developer for an exciting AI beauty company💄  Compar  Copenhagen  Full-time   Salary Competitive  Equity To be negotiated    Who are we?  Do you want to be a first mover in BeautyTech and innovate the beauty market? Compar is a highly advanced machine, utilising AI and machine learning to help consumers navigate the beauty market. Our powerful engine identifies the consumer’s unique face and hair features, then unlocks a personalised beauty space filled with beauty products, in-depth match and ingredient analysis, guides, and trends that match the consumer’s features.  We make it technologically easy and efficient for consumers to identify their unique features and give them objective, scientific, and sustainable advice for buying and applying beauty products. All of this will be available in our mobile app…which you will be building!    Why work for us?  As a startup that is well and truly in its “scale-up” phase, we offer an enormous opportunity to be a part of the most exciting time in our journey so far. A full-stack developer at Compar will be helping the business realise its potential and leave a lasting, positive impression on the beauty industry.  We are still a small team, meaning you will get to work directly with our founder, Thea. You will gain direct insight into how the business works and what makes it successful. If you are interested in being up close and personal with the decisions and processes that make a startup business successful, then you will learn a lot at Compar.  Our office is located in central Copenhagen, making it easily accessible and surrounded by beautiful buildings and cafés. We also offer a flexible working arrangement but do require you to work primarily from our office in order to collaborate directly with the team. Finally, you will not only be offered a competitive salary, but also an opportunity to have a stake in the company (equity).    What is your role?  As the new Full-Stack Developer, you will develop the frontend and backend of our mobile application and assist with our admin web application. The role will morph into a CTO or Founding Engineer depending on the right candidate’s level of skill and experience.  Current Tech Stack: React Native, React.js, Typescript, Express.js, AWS, TypeOrm, PostgreSQL, Docker, Python    Who are you?    You are comfortable developing user-friendly cross-platform mobile apps from scratch on your own and have examples to show    Full-stack developer experience, with 2+ years of experience    Experience with building secure, fast, large, and scalable RDBMS    Experience with software development projects and frameworks like Scrum    Attention to detail, quality, testing, and obsession with pixel perfection    You speak and write fluent English (and/or Danish)    You live in Denmark    Degree in Computer Science      Required skills    React Native / React.js    Typescript    Docker    Relational databases and CRUD operations, preferably experience with AWS    Understanding of UX design principles    GitHub      Bonus skills    TypeOrm, Express.js, Python    Web scraping    Mobile app development experience with phone camera, images, executing Python scripts, authentication, notifications      HOW TO APPLY    We will be inviting candidates on an ongoing basis. Please send your application by pressing 'Apply'.    Answer the screening questions    Include your LinkedIn profile and CV    If we believe you are a match for us, we will invite you to a 30 minute conversation followed by a case test and a final interview in person at our Copenhagen office.    For more information or questions please contact us at  marko@thehub.io   Perks and benefits  This job comes with several perks and benefits   Social gatherings  Social gatherings and games; hang out with your colleagues.  Equity package  Want to be a partner? Look no further.  Near public transit  Easy access and treehugger friendly workplace.  Central office  Your local office is your anchor point, thus, we placed it centrally at your convenience.  Free coffee / tea  Get your caffeine fix to get you started and keep you going.  Paid holiday  Metropolitists, beach boys and mountaineers we salute you and pay you to go and explore the world.  See all 7 benefits  Working at Compar  See company profile  Today's beauty market is a jungle to navigate, exactly 70% report experiencing choice paralysis when researching products for themselves. Consumers often choose beauty products that are wrong for them and contain harmful ingredients, resulting in poor beauty outcomes and wasteful consumption. Consumers are not aware of how their specific features have an influence on what beauty products are their match.

Our AI-driven app scans your unique face and hair features, providing you with personalized and scientifically-backed beauty advice. Discover the perfect products on the first try, save money, reduce plastic waste, and boost your confidence. With our intelligent beauty expert right at your fingertips, you'll access a wealth of knowledge beyond what a traditional beautician can offer.

Our CEO is Thea Emilie Larsen, a software developer passionated about AI, algorithms and Beauty. title: Azure Data Architect søges til Devoteam Cloud
description:
Skip to content        Creative tech for Better Change    Søg...      DK     EN       Devoteam Denmark Vælg din lokation        Ydelser    Digital Business & Products  Data-driven & Intelligence  Business Automation  Distributed Cloud  Trust & Cybersecurity  Sustainability enabled by Digital  Se alle   Partnere    AWS  Google Cloud  Microsoft  Salesforce  ServiceNow  Se alle   Ekspertise    Data Driven  Business Consulting  Creative Tech  Cyber Trust  Innovative Tech  Se alle   Insights    Succeshistorier  Analyser  Nyheder  Ekspertartikler  Webinar on demand  Se alle   Arrangementer  Om os    Devoteam kort fortalt  Hvem vi er (Danmark)  Vores kontorer  Vores teams og enheder  Corporate Social Responsibility    CSR Value  CSR Environment  CSR Ethics  CSR People   Devoteam foundation   Karriere    Arbejd hos os  Ledige stillinger  Vores værdier  Livet i Devoteam   Kontakt os  Nyhedsbrev  Indsend             Back  Azure Data Architect søges til Devoteam Cloud, Permanent contract   København • Denmark     Apply           Company Description .   Job Description  Er dataarkitektur din passion? Kan du se dig selv i en rolle, hvor du kommer til at rådgive kunder om bedste praksis for opbygning og drift af Azure baserede dataplatforme ? Så fortsæt med at læse og bliv vores nye kollega hos Devoteam Cloud 👏 🕟 Fuldtid, permanent kontrakt 📍 On-site i central København 💬 Dansk og engelsk Som vores nye Cloud Data Architect bliver du en del af et fællesskab på ca. 350 medarbejdere fordelt på to kontorer i Danmark. Du kommer til at arbejde i vores Cloud Professional Services afdeling, som i Danmark består af 20+ dygtige konsulenter. På globalt plan bliver du en del af et kompetencefællesskab af 800+ Cloud konsulenter. Vi søger en erfaren Cloud Data Architect, der trives i et tempofyldt arbejdsmiljø, er nysgerrig og ikke bange for at udfordre status quo. Du kommer til at arbejde med kunder, både i den private og offentlige sektor. Selvom din rolle primært vil være som arkitekt, er du ikke bange for at være hands-on, når det er nødvendigt, og du vil fortsætte med at udvikle dine kompetencer og holde dig opdateret på de nyeste teknologier. Mere specifikt vil rollen bl.a. indebære: At designe Azure dataløsninger Rådgivning om muligheder for dataarkitektur og pipeline mønstre og hjælpe kunder med at træffe de beslutninger, der er rigtige for dem At designe og implementere proof of concepts og "best practice” komponenter, som andre kan følge At samarbejde med andre for at forstå og dokumentere strategier og krav Planlægning af vores kunders teknisk datarejse inklusive strategi, teknisk roadmap og drift/governance For at blive glad i rollen, skal du kunne se dig selv i følgende: 3+ års erfaring med Microsoft Azure Data Solutions (f.eks. Synapse, Data Factory, Azure Data Lake, Purview, Power BI, Azure Databricks, Azure Storage, osv.) At kunne rådgive om fordele og ulemper vedrørende forskellige dataarkitektur mønstre og muligheder såsom traditionel BI kontra Lakehouse, ETL kontra ELT, og om forskellige datamodellering paradigmer Hands-on erfaring med Azure DevOps praksis (f.eks. CI/CD pipelines, IaC) og agile metoder Erfaring med Cloud baseret Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence og IoT er et plus Analytics og Report udvikling samt erfaring med relationelle databaser og SQL Nysgerrig og serviceminded tilgang Det vil være en fordel, hvis du har konsulent erfaring og erfaring med andre offentlige Cloud (f.eks. GCP eller AWS). Hvorfor Devoteam? Vi vil ikke prale, men vi kan forsikre dig om, at du bliver en del af et dygtigt og kompetent team. Hvis det ikke er nok, har vi andre fordele til at forsøde arbejdsdagen: Udfordrende opgaver - end-to-end og med frihed under ansvar 🌍 Kompetencefællesskaber - spred inspiration og bliv inspireret af andre Devoteamers 10.000+ på den globale plan 🏡 Hybrid dagligdag - du vil opleve en dagligdag fuld af fleksibilitet, hvor du både kan arbejde på kontoret, hjemmefra og hos kunder 🚀 Karriere - og udviklingsplaner - vi investerer i dig og sikrer, at du trives og udvikler dine kompetencer bl.a. med relevante certificeringer 👯 Sociale arrangementer - en sports komite, kultur komite og en fest komite Der er plads til dig - også den du er udenfor arbejdet Ansøgningsprocessen Vi søger en ny kollega hurtigst muligt, men vi søger også den rette person. Hos os behøver du ikke sende motiverede ansøgninger og besvare lange spørgeskemaer.Ansøg på få sekunder ved at uploade dit CV. Skulle du have nogle spørgsmål, er du også meget velkommen til at kontakte Daisy Tsvetkova , Talent Acquisition Partner på +45 7175 7022 eller daisy.tsvetkova@devoteam.com . Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig. Om Devoteam Devoteam er et førende digitalt konsulenthus repræsenteret i 20 lande primært i Europa, Mellemøsten og Afrika, med +10.000 ansatte. Lokalt i Danmark er vi omkring 350 medarbejdere og har to kontorer, ét centralt i København og ét centralt i Aarhus. Vi arbejder med kunder både i den private og offentlige sektor. I Danmark er vi fordelt på fem forretningsenheder, der hver især arbejder omkring digital transformation på forskellige måder. De fem forretningsenheder er: Cloud (Microsoft Cloud & Google Cloud), N Platform (ServiceNow), Digital Impulse (Management Consulting), Cyber Trust og Data Driven. Vi laver mange projekter med kunder på tværs af vores forretningsenheder og leverer tværfunktionelle løsninger. Derudover er vi strategiske partnere med AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft, Salesforce og ServiceNow.    Qualifications .   Additional Information .           Location    Kampmannsgade 2, 1604 København, Danmark          Related Job offers:         Azure Cloud Security Architect søges til Devoteam Cloud   København . Denmark   |   #Cloud & Devops Architect     Er du ekspert , når det kommer til cloud-sikkerhed? Vil du være en nøglespiller i at sikre kundernes cloud løsninger i en verden hvor sikkerhedstruslerne er støt stigende? Så fortsæt med at læse og bliv vores nye kollega hos Devoteam Cloud 👏 🕟 Fuldtid, permanent kontrakt 📍 On-site i central København 💬 Dansk og engelsk Vi forstår, at cloud sikkerhed ikke blot traditionel sikkerhed i skyen, det er anderledes og mere. Vi er trusted advisors for vores kunder, når det kommer til at rådgive om sikkerhed i cloud og det handler i høj grad om at sikre, at man inkluderer sikkerhed fra starten og bruger nye cloud native principper, når en cloud løsning designes. Og det er her, du kommer ind i billedet. Vi søger en erfaren Cloud Security Architect, der trives i et tempofyldt arbejdsmiljø, er nysgerrig og ikke bange for at udfordre status quo. Du kommer til at arbejde med kunder, både i den private og offentlige sektor. Selvom din rolle primært vil være som arkitekt, er du ikke bange for at være hands-on, når det er nødvendigt, og du vil fortsætte med at udvikle dine kompetencer og holde dig opdateret på de nyeste teknologier. Som vores nye Cloud Security Architect bliver du en del af et fællesskab på ca. 350 medarbejdere fordelt på to kontorer i Danmark. Du kommer til at arbejde i vores Cloud Professional Services afdeling, som i Danmark består af 20+ dygtige konsulenter. På globalt plan bliver du en del af et kompetencefællesskab af 2.000+ Cloud konsulenter. Mere specifikt vil rollen bl.a. indebære: Rådgivning om zero-trust tilgang til sikkerhed og design af løsninger med udgangspunkt i cloud native best practices Udvikling af sikkerheds strategiplaner og roadmaps samt vedligeholdelse af sikkerhedsarkitektur og artefakter Identificering af sikkerhedshuller i eksisterende og foreslåede arkitekturer og anbefale ændringer eller forbedringer Tilpas sikkerhedsstandarder og rammer med ansvarlige personer hos vores kunder Bidrage til den løbende udvikling af vores Cloud Security Framework For at blive glad i rollen, skal du kunne se dig selv i følgende: 3+ års hands-on erfaring med Azure cloud sikkerhed. Du forstår, at det ikke er nok at vide, hvad der bør gøres, det er også vigtigt at kunne gøre det i praksis Erfaring med at designe sikkerhed i applikationer og infrastruktur i public cloud Erfaring med avancerede sikkerhedsemner såsom godkendelsesprotokoller, identity-og access styringssystemer, Azure sikkerhedsprodukter osv. Dyb viden om emner relateret til sikkerhedsarkitektur i hybride miljøer Serviceminded konsulent attitude med en udadvendt og venlig tilgang Det vil være en fordel hvis du har hands-on erfaring med Azure Defender og Sentinel eller nogle af følgende certificeringer Microsoft SC-100, CISSP, CISM, CCSP eller lignende. Hvorfor Devoteam? Vi vil ikke prale, men vi kan forsikre dig om, at du bliver en del af et dygtigt og kompetent team. Hvis det ikke er nok, har vi andre fordele til at forsøde arbejdsdagen: Udfordrende opgaver - end-to-end og med frihed under ansvar 🌍 Kompetencefællesskaber - spred inspiration og bliv inspireret af andre Devoteamers 10.000+ på den globale plan 🏡 Hybrid dagligdag - du vil opleve en dagligdag fuld af fleksibilitet, hvor du både kan arbejde på kontoret, hjemmefra og hos kunder 🚀 Karriere - og udviklingsplaner - vi investerer i dig og sikrer, at du trives og udvikler dine kompetencer bl.a. med relevante certificeringer 👯 Sociale arrangementer - en sports komite, kultur komite og en fest komite Der er plads til dig - også den du er udenfor arbejdet Ansøgningsprocessen Vi søger en ny kollega hurtigst muligt, men vi søger også den rette person. Hos os behøver du ikke sende motiverede ansøgninger og besvare lange spørgeskemaer.Ansøg på få sekunder ved at uploade dit CV eller din LinkedIn profil. Skulle du have nogle spørgsmål, er du også meget velkommen til at kontakte Daisy Tsvetkova , Talent Acquisition Partner på +45 7175 7022 eller daisy.tsvetkova@devoteam.com  Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig. På globalt plan bliver du en del af et kompetencefællesskab af 2.000+ Cloud konsulenter. Vi søger en erfaren Cloud Architect, der trives i et tempofyldt arbejdsmiljø, er nysgerrig og ikke bange for at udfordre status quo. Sammen med dine kolleger vil du arbejde på kundeprojekter og være ansvarlig for levering af end-to-end Cloud arkitektur, hvilket gør en reel forskel for vores kunder. Selvom din rolle er arkitekt, er du ikke bange for at være hands-on, når det er nødvendigt.
